name: THERE'S A RIKISHI IN MY HOUSE
name_original: THERE'S A RIKISHI IN MY HOUSE
description:
The situation that a Rikishi prohibits you to get out from your house is one of the worst thing in your life. You must escape from your house with things what you have in your house.

THERE'S A RIKISHI IN MY HOUSE is a casual escape game. There are 15 multiple endings, and you need about 10minuites to reach each ending.
Please to kill time on a weekend with this game!
